verses.roman:
bhitare praveśi' dekhe saba andhakāra
rahite nāhika sthāna karila vicāra

synonyms: bhitare—within the universe; praveśi'-entering; dekhe—He sees; saba—all; andhakāra—darkness; rahite—to stay; nāhika—there is not; sthāna—place; karila vicāra—considered.
translation: Entering the universe, He found only darkness, with no place in which to reside. Thus He began to consider.
